basic_info.name: G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool Placement 2023
description: Proper training is provided at the college campus right from the first year. Many students were placed for distinct profiles in the college recruitment drive. In total, 595 students were successfully placed from the college in the 2023 batch. Top recruiters included TCS, Infosys, IBM, Wipro, CTS, and Mphasis.
The top salary offered in 2023 is INR 32.50 LPA, which is offered by Flipkart. The top recruiters in Placements 2023 were CTS, MIndtree, TCS, Accenture, Stellantis, etc.
Read here G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool Placement

basic_info.name: G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool Faculty
description: The faculty at G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College, Kurnool consists of a total of 201 staff, major of them are Assistant Professors. Out of them, 77 faculty members are qualified with Ph.D. Dr. R Praveen Sam was given the Adarsh Vidya Saraswathi Rashtriya Puraskar from the Global Management Council in the year 2019. Most of the other staff are qualified with Masters in their relevant domain.

basic_info.name: G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool FAQs

faqs.question: Ques. Are canteen facilities available at G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, canteen facilities are also available at the college campus. Students can enjoy quality food from the college canteen.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the library timings at G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The library timings are 9:00 am to 7:00 pm. Students can make use of the library as per these timings.

faqs.question: Ques. How many total departments are there at G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.There are six departments in the college. The names include Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Humanities and basic Sciences.

Section.name: About GPREC
Section.description:
G.Pulla Reddy Engineering College Institute is approved by AICTE and affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur (JNTUA). The college offers various fields of Engineering at UG and PG levels. The college was ranked 160 in the Engineering Colleges by NIRF in 2023. The admissions at the college are sought through counseling based on the rank secured in the EAMCET entrance exam at UG level while based on the rank secured in GATE, and PGECET at PG level.
The table given below enumerates the specialization of the courses conducted in the college. Also given are the eligibility criteria along with the duration of the courses:
Read more G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool Courses and Fees
GPREC AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
Undergraduate and postgraduate admissions are sought through web counseling based on rank secured by a candidate. AP EAMCET is considered for UG while GATE/PGECET is considered for PG admissions. These entrance exams are held annually in conjunction with the completion of previous qualifying exams.
Check here G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool Admissions
Proper training is provided at the college campus right from the first year. Many students were placed for distinct profiles in the college recruitment drive. In total, 595 students were successfully placed from the college in the 2023 batch. Top recruiters included TCS, Infosys, IBM, Wipro, CTS, and Mphasis.
The top salary offered in 2023 is INR 32.50 LPA, which is offered by Flipkart. The top recruiters in Placements 2023 were CTS, MIndtree, TCS, Accenture, Stellantis, etc.
Read here G. Pulla Reddy Engineering College Kurnool Placement
